scenes.video_prompt:
Style: Modern documentary style, shot on digital cinema camera with natural grain, desaturated muted color grade with washed-out tones, overcast daylight aesthetic

Scene Description: Main Character - Urban Professional walks through crowded Urban City Streets during morning commute. The character moves through frozen, colorless crowds clutching a black leather case containing SunVue Aviator Classic Sunglasses. The urban environment appears lifeless with desaturated grays and muted beiges. Other commuters are frozen mid-stride like mannequins, creating an eerie stillness. The character's expression shows fatigue and disconnection, eyes squinting slightly against harsh daylight, shoulders slightly hunched. The black sunglasses case is held prominently in right hand against chest. Concrete sidewalks show geometric patterns but appear dull. Glass storefronts reflect the colorless scene.

Cinematography:
Camera shot: Wide shot at eye level, positioned to capture character moving through frozen crowd
Camera motion: Slow tracking shot following character from side, steady and deliberate
Lighting: Flat overcast daylight with no dramatic shadows, creating washed-out appearance, harsh glare visible
Mood: Disconnected, weary, colorless, alienated from surroundings

Actions:
- Character walks forward at normal pace while crowd remains frozen (0-2 seconds)
- Camera tracks alongside revealing more frozen commuters in background (2-4 seconds)
- Character pauses, looks down at sunglasses case in hand with weary expression (4-6 seconds)
scenes.audio_background: Minimal ambient soundscape with muted city noise, distant traffic drone, low frequency urban hum, sparse and empty feel, slow tempo 60 BPM, no melody, atmospheric pad layer creating disconnected mood, subtle vinyl crackle texture
scenes.audio_dialogue: Narrator (warm, contemplative male voice with slight gravelly texture): In the blur of routine, we lose sight of who we are.
scenes.first_frame_image_prompt:
Modern documentary style, shot on digital cinema camera with natural grain, desaturated muted color grade with washed-out tones, overcast daylight aesthetic. Wide shot at eye level. Flat overcast daylight with no dramatic shadows, creating washed-out appearance, harsh glare visible. Disconnected, weary, colorless mood.

REFERENCE IMAGES ATTACHED:
- Main Character - Urban Professional (shows: late 20s adult, medium-warm skin tone, strong facial features, medium-length dark brown textured hair, wearing charcoal gray wool blazer, white dress shirt, dark indigo jeans, black Chelsea boots, confident neutral expression) - MODIFY to: weary fatigued expression, squinting eyes, shoulders slightly hunched, disconnected posture, NOT wearing sunglasses, holding black leather sunglasses case prominently in right hand against chest
- Urban City Streets (shows: modern downtown district, wide clean sidewalks with geometric concrete patterns, contemporary glass-and-steel buildings, street-level retail storefronts, neutral color palette of grays whites beiges, natural daylight) - MODIFY to: heavily desaturated washed-out colors, lifeless dull atmosphere, frozen mannequin-like commuters in background mid-stride, colorless gray tones throughout
- SunVue Aviator Classic Sunglasses (shows: gold metal frame aviators with double bridge, thin temples, teardrop-shaped dark gray-green polarized lenses, polished gold finish) - Character holding in CLOSED black leather case, NOT visible, NOT wearing

Hyper-realistic, photorealistic urban scene. Character positioned center-left frame walking through frozen crowd of business commuters stopped mid-motion. Geometric concrete sidewalk patterns visible but dull. Glass storefronts in background reflecting colorless scene. All colors heavily desaturated creating oppressive gray atmosphere. Character's face shows visible fatigue and disconnection. Ultra-realistic skin texture, authentic fabric details on blazer and shirt. Documentary photography style, 8K detail, real world setting with cinematic composition.

visual_effects.name: Freezing
visual_effects.description: Time freezes as glasses go on—breath becomes visible, motion stops. Perfect for showing the moment everything changes
visual_effects.timing: Throughout scene (0-6 seconds) - background commuters remain frozen while main character moves

visual_effects.name: Shadow Smoke
visual_effects.description: Dark frames dissolve into shadow, perfect for mysterious/edgy brands
visual_effects.timing: 2-4 seconds - subtle smoke/haze effect around frozen crowd creating oppressive atmosphere

scenes.video_prompt:
Style: Modern documentary style, shot on digital cinema camera with natural grain, transitioning color grade from desaturated to warm vibrant tones, dynamic lighting shift

Scene Description: Main Character - Urban Professional on Urban City Streets brings SunVue Aviator Classic Sunglasses to face and slides them on. The moment the gold aviator frames make contact with the character's face, a subtle radiant pulse ripples outward in concentric circles. As the temples slide into place behind ears, frozen commuters begin to move again, time resumes flow. Colors shift from washed-out grays to deeper saturated tones - the charcoal blazer becomes rich and textured, the white shirt gains crisp brightness, the urban environment transforms from lifeless to vital. The character's posture straightens, shoulders pull back, chin lifts slightly. The gold metal frames catch the now-warmer light. The dark gray-green polarized lenses settle into place, showing subtle reflections. The character's expression shifts from weary to centered and confident.

Cinematography:
Camera shot: Medium close-up from slightly below eye level, centered on character's face and hands
Camera motion: Slow push-in toward face as glasses slide on, creating intimate transformation moment
Lighting: Begins flat and overcast, transitions to warmer golden hour quality with soft directional light, creating gentle shadows and highlights on gold frames
Mood: Transformative, awakening, empowering, shift from disconnection to presence

Actions:
- Character lifts sunglasses case and opens it, removing gold Aviator Classic frames (0-1.5 seconds)
- Hands bring frames to face, temples unfold, first contact triggers subtle pulse effect (1.5-3 seconds)
- Temples slide behind ears as time resumes, colors deepen, posture straightens (3-4.5 seconds)
- Character settles into confident stance, frames now fully in place, catching light (4.5-6 seconds)
scenes.audio_background: Ascending orchestral strings with subtle electronic pulse, building from minimal to full, tempo increases from 60 to 90 BPM, warm brass layer enters at 3 seconds, gentle percussion adds rhythmic drive, inspiring and uplifting energy, cinematic swell creating sense of awakening

visual_effects.description: A hand adjusts the glasses, sweeping across the lens to pull the subject into the next moment. Personal, tactile, and engaging

visual_effects.description: The frames leave behind glowing trails of movement—stylized and energetic, perfect for showing frame movement

scenes.video_prompt:
Style: Modern documentary style, shot on digital cinema camera with natural grain, vibrant saturated color grade with rich warm tones, golden hour lighting aesthetic

Scene Description: Main Character - Urban Professional strides confidently through Urban City Streets now fully transformed and vibrant. The character wears SunVue Aviator Classic Sunglasses prominently displayed on face, gold frames catching warm sunlight. The polarized dark gray-green lenses show subtle reflections of the urban environment - street art murals, digital billboard headlines, and geometric patterns appear mirrored in the lens surface. As character walks, other pedestrians notice and nod with recognition and respect. The city has transformed into a saturated, energetic environment with deep colors - rich brick reds, vibrant street art blues and yellows, warm amber storefronts. The character's confident gait shows relaxed shoulders, steady purposeful stride, slight knowing smile. The Aviator frames remain the focal point, catching light from multiple angles as character moves. Street art visible in lens reflections appears to predict the character's confident path forward.

Cinematography:
Camera shot: Medium shot at eye level tracking character, frames clearly visible and prominent
Camera motion: Smooth tracking shot following character's stride, steady Steadicam movement
Lighting: Warm golden hour sunlight creating directional key light, soft fill from building reflections, rich warm color temperature around 3800K
Mood: Confident, magnetic, self-assured, commanding presence, timeless cool

Actions:
- Character strides forward with confident purposeful gait, Aviators catching light (0-2 seconds)
- Lenses show reflected street art and headlines, other pedestrians notice and nod (2-4 seconds)
- Character continues stride, slight knowing smile, frames remain focal point catching multiple light angles (4-6 seconds)
scenes.audio_background: Upbeat contemporary instrumental with strong bassline, funky guitar riff, rhythmic percussion at 110 BPM, brass stabs adding confidence and swagger, energetic and stylish feel, modern urban groove with vintage soul influences, building energy and momentum
scenes.audio_dialogue: Narrator (warm, confident male voice): When you see clearly, the world sees you.

scenes.video_prompt:
Style: Modern documentary style, shot on digital cinema camera with natural grain, high contrast color grade with deep blacks and bright highlights, dramatic architectural lighting

Scene Description: Main Character - Urban Professional crosses a modern glass skybridge suspended above busy traffic. The character wears SunVue Aviator Classic Sunglasses prominently. Harsh sunlight streams through the glass walls and ceiling creating complex patterns of light and shadow. The floor is polished reflective surface showing mirror image below. As character walks, their reflection in the massive glass walls begins to shift and rearrange - the reflection shows an even more confident, almost heroic silhouette with the Aviator frames becoming the dominant focal point. Character pauses mid-bridge and reaches up to adjust the gold Aviator frames with right hand, touching the temple piece. The moment of adjustment causes the glass reflections to crystallize into perfect geometric patterns radiating from the frames. The polarized lenses cut through the harsh glare creating clear vision while all around harsh reflections bounce chaotically. Traffic below is visible through floor but character remains steady and focused. The architectural space is modern with steel beams and floor-to-ceiling glass panels.

Cinematography:
Camera shot: Wide shot from low angle showing full glass skybridge architecture, character centered mid-bridge
Camera motion: Slow dolly forward following character's walk, steady and deliberate, emphasizing architectural space
Lighting: Harsh directional sunlight streaming through glass creating dramatic shadows and highlights, high contrast with reflections everywhere except in polarized lenses
Mood: Powerful, commanding, transcendent, symbolic confidence, architectural drama

Actions:
- Character walks forward across glass bridge, complex light patterns dancing across scene (0-2 seconds)
- Reflections in glass walls begin to shift, showing heroic silhouette with Aviators prominent (2-3.5 seconds)
- Character pauses, reaches up to adjust gold Aviator frames with deliberate touch (3.5-5 seconds)
- Glass reflections crystallize into geometric patterns radiating from frames as adjustment completes (5-6 seconds)
scenes.audio_background: Epic cinematic orchestral score with deep percussion, soaring strings, powerful brass section, tempo 85 BPM with strong downbeats, dramatic pauses and builds, inspiring and triumphant energy, modern film score aesthetic with electronic undertones, building to powerful crescendo

scenes.video_prompt:
Style: Modern documentary style, shot on digital cinema camera with natural grain, dynamic color grade transitioning from desaturated to rich vibrant tones, golden hour to magic hour lighting

Scene Description: Main Character - Urban Professional stands on rooftop overlook with expansive Urban City Streets visible in background sprawling to horizon. Character wears SunVue Aviator Classic Sunglasses. The scene begins at golden hour with warm light. Character reaches up with both hands and removes the gold Aviator frames from face. The moment the frames lift away, the entire city view desaturates and dulls - colors drain to muted grays and blues, the warm light becomes flat and lifeless, the vibrant urban landscape loses energy. Character holds the Aviators at arm's length for a beat, examining them in the fading light. Then with deliberate confident motion, character brings the frames back to face and slides them on again. The instant the temples settle behind ears, the city snaps back to vivid saturated life - warm amber lights ignite across buildings, the sky deepens to rich purples and oranges of magic hour, street lights below create golden bokeh patterns. Character's posture is commanding and centered. The final frame holds on character silhouetted against the now-brilliant cityscape, Aviator frames catching the last rays of golden light, creating lens flares. SunVue logo materializes in lower right corner.

Cinematography:
Camera shot: Medium shot from behind and slightly to side, showing character in profile with city spread behind
Camera motion: Starts static, slow push-in as frames come off, gentle pull-back as they go on revealing full cityscape
Lighting: Begins warm golden hour, transitions to flat overcast when frames removed, returns to rich magic hour with deep oranges and purples when frames return, dramatic backlight creating rim light on character
Mood: Revelatory, powerful, conclusive, ownership of vision, timeless confidence locked in

Actions:
- Character stands gazing at vibrant golden hour city, wearing Aviators confidently (0-1.5 seconds)
- Both hands reach up and remove frames; city immediately desaturates and dulls (1.5-3 seconds)
- Character holds frames at arm's length, examining them as dull city spreads behind (3-4 seconds)
- Character brings frames back to face with decisive motion, slides them on (4-5 seconds)
- City snaps to brilliant vivid colors, character locks into confident stance, SunVue logo appears, final hero frame (5-6 seconds)
scenes.audio_background: Powerful cinematic finale with full orchestra, soaring melody in strings and brass, strong rhythmic foundation at 95 BPM, triumphant and inspiring, builds to emotional peak with choir-like synth pad, modern epic trailer music aesthetic, resolves with confident resolution and sustained final note
scenes.audio_dialogue: Narrator (warm, authoritative male voice with gravelly confidence): SunVue. Own what you see.
